announcements.title: Welcome to Transformer Lab
announcements.content: Welcome to Transformer Lab! We're excited to have you here.

announcements.title: Deprecating Transformer Lab Desktop App
announcements.content: Transformer Lab will be discontinuing publishing a desktop app starting with the next minor version. Going forward, the supported method to run Transformer Lab will be to install via the command line and access through a browser. Full details are available at https://lab.clolud/docs/install.
